title.narrative: GAMBIA - READ: Results for Education Achievement and Development Project

description.narrative: To increase access to basic education, improve quality of teaching and learning in lower basic schools, and strengthen education systems.

participating-org.narrative: Minister of Finance and Economic Affairs
Ministry of Basic and Secondary Education

title.narrative: Mean scores in (English) in grade 3 in National Assessment Test (NAT)
Head Teachers skilled to interpret NAT results
Student teachers enrolled in revised PTC program
UBS and SSS English teachers benefited from training programs using the newly developed e-curriculum
Number of additional qualified primary teachers resulting from project interventions.
Public upper basic and senior secondary schools installed with solar power
Stationery packages provided to students in lower basic schools in hardship areas
Teachers in grades 1-3, from randomly selected 15% of schools, showing good teaching performance as observed through the new classroom observation tool
Additional students in public ECD, LBS and UBS (Total)
Number of additional classrooms built or rehabilitated at the primary level resulting from project interventions.
Head Teachers in lower basic schools adjusting School Development Plans in response to NAT results and approved by Regional Directorates using an agreed upon check list
Annual formal and informal school fees paid by parents to public lower basic schools
Annual formal and informal school fees paid by parents to public upper basic schools
Communities with > 3 km to nearest lower basic school in Region 3,4,5,6
Externally reviewed and overseen end-of-year examination in place for students completing second year of revised PTC and HTC programs at Gambia College
Annual training, promotion and postings exercise based on annually updated personnel records in interfaced EMIS and HR systems
Basic Education Sector communication strategy developed by the MoBSE
Citizen feedback was included in the development of school improvement grant manual, measured by minutes of meeting with citizens
DLI #3: First tranche (40%) of annual school grants transferred from MOBSE by Sept 15 in year 1 to all public upper basic schools (DLI year 1)
DLI #6: Annual School Census data collection carried out including Madrassas and min. 95% response rate and results and analytical report released by May 2014
DLI#2: First tranche (40%) of annual school grants transferred from MOBSE by Sept 15 in year 0 to all public lower basic schools (DLI year 0)
ECD monitoring tool developed by ECD Unit in MOBSE
HR supplementary data (personnel details, qualifications, promotion and postings history) updated in HR database at Directorate of HR at MOBSE
Reading curriculum guidelines developed by Directorate of Curriculum at MOBSE based on evaluation results of early reading strategies
Average NAT attendance of grade 8 students in all public schools for two full days
Average NAT attendance of grade 3 and 5 students in all public schools for two full days
Number of additional classrooms built for ECD
Pupil textbook ratio of core textbooks in grades 1-9 in public schools
